channel.title: Footers on FlaRUS
channel.description: Recent content in Footers on FlaRUS

item.title: About
item.description: Flarus provides technical support, localization and distribution of Flarum for Russian-speaking users.

item.title: Disclaimer
item.description: Flarus collaborates with the Flarum contributors and is not directly related to the Flarum Foundation or the Flarum project. The Flarum logo is owned by the Flarum Foundation. This site operates independently of the Flarum Foundation and the Flarum project.
